lead_paragraph: Jack Nicklaus hosted Ryder Cup captain Davis Love III and 22 players for dinner in his home and spoke about how to prepare for big tournaments, a most appropriate topic.

headline.print_headline: Nicklaus Preaches Preparation at Ryder Cup Dinner
headline.main: Nicklaus Preaches Preparation at Ryder Cup Dinner
